about_the_game:
Story

Hey, can you hear me?　Can you see me?

You, after quitting your job, was casually browsing the video site with the spare time. It was 2 am when a strange video with a blank thumbnail caught your eye.

"What is this? What's happening...?"

The viewer count of the live stream was 1, with no one but yourself watching. The avatar on the other side looked puzzled, as if she had not intended to do any of the things.

The next day, you receive a message: "Will you produce 'Owarino Rinne' with me?"

"I keep having the same dream. I dream of traveling somewhere far away."

"Becoming a VTuber is like a near-death experience."

Game System

You are managing the new VTuber "Owarino Rinne", a doomsday type VTuber. Switching between "Chat mode" and "Stream mode," you will give advice on video planning and activities.

Chat Mode

This is the part where you chat and call with Rinne using a communication app AloneZoo to advance the story. You will guide her as a beginner VTuber through everything from proposing a project to mental care. The content of the conversation changes depending on the response options.

Stream Mode

Based on the plan developed in the call mode, Rinne will stream on a video site. Talking, singing and even ASMR streaming... what awaits her at the end of her increasingly broadening streaming life?

Character

Name

Owarino Rinne

Height

160cm

Hobbies

Sometimes finding delicious preserved food.

A girl who travels around the post-apocalypse world. She streams from an abandoned train with a mysterious cat-like creature (named "Emergency Food").

Her personality is easygoing, with few emotional ups and downs.

Staff

Scenario and direction

Gainen Sanagi

System and sound

Ao Takeuma

Character Design and Illustration

Itsuki Inubozaki

Product Information

Title

Near-Death-Expedition

System requirements

Supported OS: Windows or macOS

Estimated playing time

90 to 120 minutes

Rules for live video and live streaming, etc.

◽️ live-playing videos are welcome! ◽️

Purchasers of “Near-Death-Expedition” are allowed to play the entire game live.

Please make sure to put the URL of “Near-Death-Expedition” on Steam in the summary section. Monetization is also acceptable.

We also welcome your feedback on social networking sites.

How to play

Basic operation

Left click/Enter/Space key ... Progress text

Right click ... Switch between stream mode and chat mode

Move the cursor to the bottom center to display the menu. The menu is in order from left to right

(1) Stream button ... Moves to stream mode.

(2) Chat button ... Moves to chat mode.

(3) Auto ... Automatically progresses the text.

(4) Quick Load ... Resume from the point saved by Quick Save.

(5) Quick Save ... Save the progress at your favorite scene.

(6) Menu: Opens the menu screen.

short_description: After quitting the job, you were casually browsing a video site when you saw a strange video with a blank thumbnail. "Can you hear me? Can you see me...?" The next day, you receive a message requesting you to be the manager of the mysterious VTuber "Owarino Rinne". The endless journey begins.
